name: UAE (DIFC)

typical_paths.label: DIFC fund manager orientation (informational)
bullets: DIFC has a distinct regulatory perimeter; verify categories of funds and manager permissions with DFSA materials.
Distribution and client categorization are critical; treat as high disclaimer.

marketing_notes: Marketing is governed by DFSA rules and DIFC perimeter; investor classification matters materially.
Confirm any cross-border promotion rules into UAE onshore vs DIFC.
requires_counsel_triggers: Any marketing to UAE onshore persons vs DIFC persons.
Any reliance on exemptions without DFSA-aligned review.
